name: Light & Dark (HaiderNaqvii@FreelancePakistanGames)
description:
NOTE: The Web build contains the original game that was made in 3 hours! In order to Play that latest build please download the Windows Executable File! Thankyou

This is a game concept and was made in about 3 hours for the Trijam,

Since it was my first time participating in this jam i forgot to add a lot of things!This is a puzzle game in which you have to help the black and white squares to reach their destination! 

Controls

Black Square moves in the opposite direction of the White Square. Black cannot touch white and vice versa.

USE A,D or Left,Right arrow keys to move

USE Space or W to Jump

I will add an updated version with some more levels and content and also some polish but I'm not sure if I'll make this into a complete game
